title: Crazy Corn Toreados
instructions: Step 1: Cook the corn cobs and cook for about 20 minutes. Insert the wooden skewers.
Step 2: Add two spoonfuls of Mayonnaise on the aluminum foil and then place the corn rotating it so that it is completely covered with Mayonnaise.
Step 3: Now cover with the crushed Cappy and finally sprinkle with cheese.
